article.title: Laszakovits, Spencer, Geuting & Cavazos Take AT&T Gov't Solutions Posts
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer
article.text: AT&T Government Solutions, Oakton, Virginia, has named Lt. Col. Gerry Laszakovits, USAF (Ret.), director, Air Force Division; Col. Lance H. Spencer, USAF (Ret.), director, National Security Strategic Development; and Col. David C. Geuting, USAF (Ret.), and Adam Cavazos managers for Air Force Account Development.
